input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: STATE SECRETARIAT FOR ECONOMIC AFFAIRS SECO. Summary: (Ur_01129-01) for the Implementation of the “Competitiveness for Recovery Ukraine 2026-2030 Program”. Description: SECO is inviting interested parties to submit bids as Implementing Agency for the Competitiveness for Recovery Ukraine 2026-2030 Program. The Program aims to promote a dynamic and competitive private sector in Ukraine, recognizing competitiveness as a key driver of the country-s economic recovery, sustainable growth, and long-term prosperity. It consists of four complementary components designed to address key challenges and opportunities across the different dimensions of competitiveness: (i) policy and regulatory environment for competitiveness, (ii) sectoral competitiveness and innovative value chains, (iii) enhancing SME competitiveness, and (iv) labour market conditions. SECO is seeking an Implementing Agency to manage the implementation of the first three components, and the overall coordination of the Program. The mandate includes a basic contract of five years and the option for a second five-year phase of the Program. <br> Doc Title: (UR_01129-01) for the Implementation of the “Competitiveness for Recovery Ukraine 2026-2030 Program” <br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-11-20. Closing Date: 2026-01-30. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Activities: · (Measure 3) Organise the third national forum on business and human rights in 2026 and roundtable discussions involving companies, academia, non-governmental organisations, the public sector and international organisations. · (Measure 5 reinforced) Ensuring the transfer of knowledge and best practices between the various actors. Description: The Nature Conservation (FNS) department is the body in the canton of Zurich responsible for the execution of nature conservation legislation. As part of theAction plan Flora is designated which species should be preserved and promoted in the long term with special measures. With the revision of the Energy Ordinance of March 8, 2008, the Federal Council commissioned the Federal Office of Energy (BFE) to implement the tenders, in 2010the first "competitive tenders". Since then, "competitive tenders", under the name "Prokilowatt", have been carried out annually.The operational implementation takes place by an external office, with all tasks related to web-based application processing, hosting and maintaining the web input tool, the management of the database, accompanying the project and program implementation as well as the controlling of theimplemented measures are operational activities. Summary: Project Ur_01132-01 for the Implementation of the ‘Circular Electronics Initiative (Cei)- Programme (Mid-2025 to Mid-2029). Description: The implementing agency is the entity in charge of overall programme management, including operational, administrative and financial management. The overall development objective of the Circular Electronics Initiative is to develop framework conditions that enable the implementation of sustainable re-use and recycling of WEEE (Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment) practices in SECO partner countries. The programme is focusing on four elements: * development of an adequate legislative, policy and institutional framework; * clear normative requirements and verification/enforcement mechanisms ensuring a level playing field; * an appropriate, professionally functioning collection and treatment (including re-use and recycling technology), and * statistics and monitoring.
